hub.com/repos/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pulls/4294","html_url":"https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pull/4294","diff_url":"https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pull/4294.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pull/4294.patch"},"body":"## Description
Main changes made by this PR:
- Update CMSIS to v5
- Update CMSIS-RTOS to v2
- Update RTX to v5
- Remove `NVIC_SetVector` and `NVIC_GetVector` from target code as it's provided by CMSIS
- Copy interrupt vector table ROM->RAM
- Rework boot sequence
- Add RTOS1 compatibility including CMSIS adapter and RTOS1 types for both C and C++ APIs
- Optimize memory usage in tests
- Redefine thread/main/isr stack sizes
- Remove Cortex A and ARM7 support

## Status
**IN DEVELOPMENT**

## Related PRs
List related PRs against other branches:
* PAL: https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-client-pal/pull/75
* MCR20 driver (mesh): https://github.com/ARMmbed/mcr20a-rf-driver/pull/9
* Docs: https://github.com/ARMmbed/Handbook/pull/160

## Todos
- [ ] Fix Oulu CI (PAL: https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-client-pal/pull/75)
- [x] Merge work in progress work from Martin 
- [x] Move docs to handbook repo (docs/cmsis_rtx.md)
- [x] Fix failing uVisor CI
- [x] Revert changes that make Nanostack examples pass (PI name) and fix it properly
- [x] Fix mesh minimal tests failing by merging https://github.com/ARMmbed/mcr20a-rf-driver/pull/9"},"comment":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/ARMmbed/mbed-os/issues/comments/305517780","html_url":"https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pull/4294#issuecomment-305517780","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/ARMmbed/mbed-os/issues/4294","id":305517780,"user":{"login":"mbed-bot","id":12690234,"avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/12690234?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot","html_url":"https://github.com/mbed-bot","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mbed-bot/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2017-06-01T14:51:48Z","updated_at":"2017-06-01T14:51:48Z","body":"# [Result: FAILURE](http://mbed-ci-master-2.austin.arm.com:8081/job/pr_pipeline/395/)
